name: homekit-adk
description: HomeKit Accessory Development Kit - Apple HomeKit Accessory Protocol implementation

nfc.description: Enable NFC support using libnfc (build from source on Windows - see Scripts/Build-Dependencies.ps1)

ble.description: Enable FULL Bluetooth Low Energy peripheral support using BTstack (build from source on Windows - see Scripts/Build-Dependencies.ps1)

qrcode.description: Enable QR code generation using libqrencode (build from source on Windows - see Scripts/Build-Dependencies.ps1)

mbedtls.description: Use MbedTLS 4.x (with TLS 1.3 support) instead of OpenSSL for cryptography

bonjour.description: mDNS service discovery support (Windows only, requires Bonjour SDK)

testing.description: Build unit tests and test applications
